alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 17 at 2:25AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain continues to be possible WHERE...Tutuila, Aunuu, Manu`a and Swains. WHEN...Through Wednesday. IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A trough will linger over the territory through Wednesday. This weather feature will keep the potential for flash flooding in the next couple of days. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 225 Vaveao Aso Lua Me 17 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE ASO LULU... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega o le a mafua mai i timuga mamafa o loo gasolo mai. NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunuu, Manu`a ma Swains. TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Lulu. AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea auvai pa pa. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o lo`o i luga o le atunu`u o le a tumau e oo atu i le Aso Lulu. O nei uiga louloua o le a fa`atupula`ia ai le tetele o timuga ma faititili e taape ai i le po nanei seia oo atu i le Aso Lulu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
